binary=function(x){
  i=0
  bin=0
  while(x!=0)
  {
    rem=x%%2
    bin=bin+rem*(10^i)
    x=x%/%2
    i=i+1
  }
  return(bin)
}
decimal=function(x){
  i=0
  dec=0
  while(x!=0)
  {
    rem=x%%10
    dec=dec+rem*(2^i)
    x=x%/%10
    i=i+1
  }
  return(dec)
}
a=array(0)
n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
for(i in 1:n){
  a[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter a value:"))
}
print(a)
b=sapply(a,binary)
c=array(0)
for(i in 1:n-1){
  c[i]=bitwOr(b[i],b[i+1])
}
c
d=sapply(c,decimal)
cat("output is:",c(d,a[n]))
